description.en: View detailed information about a specific MultiversX transaction by its hash. Get complete transaction data including status, sender, receiver, value in EGLD, gas information, timestamp, nonce, and execution details. Perfect for transaction verification and tracking.
description.de: Zeige detaillierte Informationen zu einer bestimmten MultiversX-Transaktion anhand ihres Hashes. Erhalte vollständige Transaktionsdaten einschließlich Status, Absender, Empfänger, Wert in EGLD, Gas-Informationen, Zeitstempel, Nonce und Ausführungsdetails. Ideal zur Transaktionsverifikation und -verfolgung.

description.en: The transaction hash to look up.

output.VALUE: transform:() => { const val = results.TX_DATA?.value || '0'; return BigInt(val).toString(); }

success.en: Transaction {{TX_HASH}}: Status {{STATUS}}, Value {{VALUE_FORMATTED}} EGLD. From {{SENDER}} to {{RECEIVER}}.
success.de: Transaktion {{TX_HASH}}: Status {{STATUS}}, Wert {{VALUE_FORMATTED}} EGLD. Von {{SENDER}} an {{RECEIVER}}.
